textPashto: د هر کار پیل سخت دی
translationEn: The beginning of every task is hard
meaning: Starting something new always seems difficult, but persistence makes it easier.

textDari: گرگ پیر از گله دور می‌افتد
textPashto: زوړ وولف له خپلو ګله لرې کېږي
translationEn: The old wolf falls away from the pack
meaning: Those who are no longer useful are often abandoned by the group.

textDari: دوستی در وقت سختی امتحان می‌شود
textPashto: دوستي په سختو حالاتو کې ازموینه کېږي
translationEn: Friendship is tested in times of difficulty
meaning: True friends are those who stand by you when things get tough.

textPashto: زموږ څخه دی چې زموږ باندې دیv
translationEn: It is from us that is upon us
meaning: We are responsible for our own fate
